attributes.action: Make Sky and Freesat provide the same Free To Air channels as Freeview.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Living in an area that cannot receive signals from a main transmitter, I and my neighbours, like no doubt many others, will receive "Freeview Lite", ie. a partial list of Digital Terrestrial channels.

Since Freesat doesn't provide some channels, eg. Dave and Virgin 1, and Sky charges for them, we will be forced to pay a Sky subscription, in order to receive what others, who receive their TV signals from a main transmitter, get for free.

I call on the Prime Minister to make  Sky and Freesat provide the same channels as Freeview , as Free To Air channels.
